Package pieces

Class Knight

java.lang.Object
pieces.Piece
pieces.Knight
public class Knight
extends Piece
Knight is a subclass of the abstract Piece class and Knight.java provides the implementation needed for a knight chess piece

    • validMove

      public boolean validMove​(Board board, java.lang.String move)
      validMove checks if the move made by a player can be made
      Specified by:
      validMove in class Piece
      Parameters:
      board - Board object where the game is being played on
      move - the input of the player containing the current position of the piece as well as the end position
      Returns:
      true if the move inputted by the used is a valid move

    • isKingInCheck

      public boolean isKingInCheck​(Board board)
      isKingInCheck checks if the king is in check by a knight
      Specified by:
      isKingInCheck in class Piece
      Parameters:
      board - Board object where the game is played on
      Returns:
      true if the knight could kill a king if the king is not moved immediately

    • knightMovements

      public boolean knightMovements​(Board board, int endRank, int endFile)
      knightMovements checks all the possible movements of a knight where a king could be in check
      Parameters:
      board - Board object where the game is played on
      endRank - rank of the knight
      endFile - file of knight
      Returns:
      true if there is a knight threatening the king
